name: route_random_sigma
description: the randomization sigma of edge weights

name: exploration_percentage
description: the percentage of routes we want to use for exploration

name: max_speed_and_length_factor
description: how much the length/speed influences the routing

name: average_edge_duration_factor
description: how much the averageEdgeFactor influences the routing

name: freshness_update_factor
description: how much the freshnessUpdateFactor influences the routing

name: freshness_cut_off_value
description: if data is older than this we do not consider it in the algorithm

name: re_route_every_ticks_description
description: check for a new route very x times after the car starts
